title: MAG 009 - A Father's Love - Transcript Re-formatted
text:
and the group 
fragmented shortly afterwards. The police made many attempts to follow up 
on this lead in the Montauk case, but were never able to locate any members 
willing to make statements. 
The house on York Road is still inhabited, though the current owners pulled 
down the shed over a decade ago and replaced it with a patio 
Statement ends.
